title: no flex

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Hello fellow summoners. Just wanted to say a few thins about this kid "no flex".

He is a plat 5 shitter that thinks he knows it all and thinks he is top fkn shit. This kid is a fkn shitter and plays like a fkn autistic child. He will sht talk the entire game about how his entire team are shitters except him and WILL make you ultimately lose the game because of how sht he is. If i ever see you irl kid ill chop ur mothers flaps off and eat them with my toast for breakfast. lata. Sorry for bad england if u dont understend me, pls no copy pasta ty. Fkn shitter kid hope u see dis 1.

Regards
CptSquirtle

replies.body:
1: name and shame? kys plz.
2: 500 LKS in under a month, 300 odd in 4 days....boosted?
3: lvl 15? kys plz. if you aint got the balls to post from main, dont post.
4: u proly the shitter.
